Hortifruti: This section offers fresh fruits and vegetables. Grocery store: Here you will find dry and canned food items, such as rice, beans, pasta, cereals, sauces and canned goods in general. Meat: Includes beef, pork, poultry, fish and seafood, fresh or frozen. Cold cuts and dairy products: This section offers cheese, yogurt, milk, butter, margarine, ham and sausages. Bakery: Here you will find breads, cakes, sweets and snacks, both fresh and processed. Drinks: In this area, you will find alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks, such as water, soft drinks, juices, beers, wines and spirits. Frozen: This section contains frozen foods such as ice cream, ready meals, frozen vegetables and fruits. Cleaning Products: In this area, you will find detergents, washing powder, disinfectants, fabric softeners, and other products for hygiene and domestic cleaning. Personal Hygiene and Beauty: Here you will find products such as shampoo, conditioner, soaps, deodorants, makeup, and products for skin and hair care. Baby Items: In this section, you all find diapers, wipes, baby food, bottles, and other related items. Pet Shop: Here you will find food and accessories for pets, such as food, toys, houses and hygiene products. Appliances and Electronics: This area offers products such as televisions, refrigerators, stoves, microwaves, smartphones, and other electronic devices and household appliances. Housewares and decoration: Here you will find items such as kitchen utensils, cutlery, pots, towels, bed linen and decoration objects. Stationery and office: In this section, you will find school and office supplies, such as notebooks, pens, pencils, diaries and computer items. Others: seasonal or unforeseen items.
